title: Persian cucumber and yoghurt dip
description: Try this cucumber, herb and garlic dip as a side dish or as part of a mezze-style meal.

default: 1 large cucumber, coarsely grated or finely diced
20g/¾oz dill, stalks and leaves finely chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
extra virgin olive oli, for drizzling

steps: Carefully squeeze out and discard the excess water from the grated cucumber – you can do this by hand or in a sieve. Place the grated cucumber in a mixing bowl and mix in the yogurt.
Add the garlic and dill, mix well and season to taste with sea salt and black pepper. Serve with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.
